The repository name is too long. The repository name contains illegal special characters. An error occurred while editing this repository name. Authentication failed for this repository. The password must be at least 8 characters long, and contain at least one alphabet, one number and one special character. The display name cannot contain special characters. Enter your name. Enter the URL. Enter your password. The current password is required. The new password is required. Passwords do not match. Your session has expired. You must log in again. Network connection is required to perform this operation. An error occurred while creating the folder. An error occurred while downloading the file. As the file owner, you have all rights to this file. Here are the rights granted to other users: Only the file owner can check the activity log. You have not been granted any rights. Do you really want to delete the URL? Changes should be saved firstly,then can remove it. The URL already exists. Repository already exists. The file you are sharing is expired. No rights found according to the given classification. No permissions determined by centralized policies. The file you have selected is already protected.
